long_description: The Timbuk2 Slate Backpack is a sleek, mid-size pack for everyday use in the city or for travels further afield. Roomy main compartment has a back drop-in pocket that can hold up to a 15 in. laptop. Backpack straps are padded and adjustable for comfort. Mesh back panel ventilates to keep you cool and dry. 3 front webbing straps with rip-and-stick closure can hold a bike U-lock, climbing shoes, helmet or other accessories. Front zip pocket secures gadgets. Timbuk2 Slate Backpack has mesh side pockets that fit water bottles or U-locks.
short_description: The Timbuk2 Slate Backpack is a sleek, mid-size pack for everyday use in the city or for travels further afield.
